verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w shadowing|strong="H6767"\w* with \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, which \add is\add* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*:

That \w sendeth|strong="H7971"\w* \w ambassadors|strong="H6735"\w* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, even in \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w bulrushes|strong="H1573"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, ye \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, to a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w scattered|strong="H4900"\w* and \w peeled|strong="H4178"\w*, to a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* from their beginning \w hitherto|strong="H1973"\w*; a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* meted \w out|strong="H6978"\w* and trodden \w down|strong="H4001"\w*, whose \w land|strong="H0776"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* have \w spoiled|strong="H0958"\w*!\f + \fr 18.2 \ft scattered…: or, outspread and polished\f*\f + \fr 18.2 \ft meted…: or, that meteth out and treadeth down: Heb. of line, line, and treading under foot\f*\f + \fr 18.2 \ft have…: or, despise\f*

All ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, and \w dwellers|strong="H7931"\w* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* ye, when he lifteth \w up|strong="H5375"\w* an \w ensign|strong="H5251"\w* on the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; and when he \w bloweth|strong="H8628"\w* a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye.

For \w so|strong="H3541"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, I will take my \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, and I will \w consider|strong="H5027"\w* in my dwelling \w place|strong="H4349"\w* like a \w clear|strong="H6703"\w* \w heat|strong="H2527"\w* upon \w herbs|strong="H0216"\w*, \add and\add* like a \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w* of \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* in the \w heat|strong="H2527"\w* of \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.\f + \fr 18.4 \ft consider…: or, regard my set dwelling\f*\f + \fr 18.4 \ft upon…: or, after rain\f*

For \w afore|strong="H6440"\w* the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, when the \w bud|strong="H6525"\w* is \w perfect|strong="H8552"\w*, and the sour \w grape|strong="H1155"\w* is \w ripening|strong="H1580"\w* in the \w flower|strong="H5328"\w*, he shall both cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w sprigs|strong="H2150"\w* with pruning \w hooks|strong="H4211"\w*, and take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \add and\add* cut \w down|strong="H8456"\w* the \w branches|strong="H5189"\w*.

They shall be \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* unto the \w fowls|strong="H5861"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and to the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w fowls|strong="H5861"\w* shall \w summer|strong="H6972"\w* upon them, and all the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w winter|strong="H2778"\w* upon them.

¶ In that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* shall the \w present|strong="H7862"\w* be \w brought|strong="H2986"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* of a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w scattered|strong="H4900"\w* and \w peeled|strong="H4178"\w*, and from a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w terrible|strong="H3372"\w* from their beginning \w hitherto|strong="H1973"\w*; a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* meted \w out|strong="H6978"\w* and trodden under \w foot|strong="H4001"\w*, whose \w land|strong="H0776"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* have \w spoiled|strong="H0958"\w*, to the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.  +  r 18.7  t scattered…: or, outspread and polished *
